458460.name: One Piece Burning Blood - PREORDER BONUS
458460.description:
Preorder One Piece Burning Blood and get access to incredible bonuses:
  • Gear 4th Luffy: Get ready to play as Luffy in his latest Gear form transformation for the entire fight! Boundman!
  • Kung Fu Luffy: Based on a sketch from Eiichiro Oda, this playable character features Luffy in traditional Kung Fu attire, ready to show off his martial arts prowess.
  • Afro Luffy: Is it an afro that makes the champion, or the champion that makes the afro? Find out with this playable character featuring attire famously worn by Luffy in the Davy Back Fight.
  • Luffy HUD: Customize your game with a Luffy themed HUD!
458460.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语, 俄语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 韩语
